headline: The social layer doctors actually need.
subheadline: BeyondRounds connects verified physicians in small, curated weekend groups — so you can build real friendships without the friction of organizing it yourself.
challengeTitle: Medicine is demanding. Friendships shouldn't have to be.
challengeP1: Long hours, rotating hospitals, new cities — the structure of medical careers makes it nearly impossible to maintain a rich social life. Most doctors we speak to describe the same thing: surrounded by people all day, yet genuinely lonely outside work.
challengeP2: The problem isn't motivation. It's structure — and that's exactly what BeyondRounds provides.
expect1Desc: 3–4 doctors per meetup. Matched by interests, city, and availability. Intimate enough for real conversation.
expect2Desc: Every Thursday you receive a new group. Every weekend is an opportunity to meet someone real.
expect3Desc: Every member goes through medical license verification. You know you're among peers.
expect4Desc: Brunch, coffee, a walk — chosen by the group together. No agenda. No pressure.
expect5Desc: Just warm, genuine social connection between people who get what your life looks like.
step1Desc: Fill in your specialty, city, and a few interests. Takes about 3 minutes.
step2Desc: We verify your medical credentials. Keeps the community trusted.
step3Desc: Every Thursday: a curated group of 3–4 doctors in Berlin.
step4Desc: Pick a time and place together. Show up. That's it.
berlinP1: Berlin has one of the largest concentrations of international physicians in Germany — and one of the hardest social fabrics to break into as a newcomer. BeyondRounds was built specifically for this.
berlinP2: Whether you arrived last month or last year, your first curated group is waiting.
ctaSubtitle: Verified physicians only. Small groups. This weekend in Berlin.
